divs: Sighting Details jan 31st 2013 around 7:15,somewhere around that time I seen a then long whitish object moving very very slowly through the clouds...it kinda camoflauge with the clouds but had a little streak to it but for the most part it was white..I was so amazed because I know it wasnt a plane I live right next the airport and and airforce base; however this object was just peacefully and slowly i mean very slowly moving through the morning sky...not obvious to anyone to see but it was for me because I am a school crossin guard and i normally am aware of my surroundings being that it do get a little boring standing there. No sound or anything. I though it could had been a skywriter but it sure wasnt...I studied it for 5 mintutes and lost site of it when I had to cross the kids.. I am amazed.
trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around January 31st 2013
Summary: seen a long thin whitish object moving etreamly slow across the sky
